description:
This is a wonderful course that is dedicated to your Core Values for your Dream Job. You start off this course with an inspirational quote by Marilyn Strong, author of the book "Getting Paid to Pay Attention". Next, you will learn what Values are and then study 39 Core Values for your Dream Job. After this, you will complete an exercise to determine your Top 5 Core Values and then write a reflection based on this exercise. The course is only about 30 minutes long and consists of 6 video tutorials. Don’t let the length fool you; it’s packed with great information. I hope you enjoy this wonderful course and the insightful exercises. Here is what you will find in this course:

  • an understanding of what Values are,
  • a thorough investigation of the 39 Core Values needed for your Dream Job,
  • various jobs that link to these Values,
  • 4 inspirational & interactive exercises that will help you explore your Values,
  • 6 time-tested, dynamic, fun, creative, engaging, and insightful VIDEO TUTORIALS; approximately 30 minutes of information.
  • Communication with other like-minded Dream Job Explorers on Udemy & Facebook,
  • E-mail support from David!
  • Discounts off private coaching sessions with David!
  • Discounts off future courses!

By the end of this course, you will have

  • understood what Values are,
  • explored the 39 Core Values needed for your Dream Job,
  • listed your Top 5 Core Values,
  • written reflections on your Top 5 Core Values,
  • understood why you must have these 5 Core Values for your Dream Job,
  • be shown where to search for your Dream Jobs.
title: Values For Your Dream Job
